title: Jack
description: Centuries ago, giants and humans lived together on earth. The giants were cruel creatures that dominated the humans and eventually planned to eradicate them. But before they could carry out their terrible plan, they were exiled to Terris, a strange land in the clouds. Now, Taran, a descendent of both giant and human ancestors, discovers a secret portal into this mysterious place and meets his long lost twin brother, Jack, who plans to restore the giants to earth and dominate the humans once again. Taran must use all his skills and instincts to discern friend from foe, stop Jack and keep peace on the earth.Learn the real story behind the old English folk tale of Jack and the Beanstalk.This is the first book in the Terris Trilogy.
author: Timothy   James
